alert.note: Alert for Clay; Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clay and southern Hamilton Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Giltner, or 19 miles northeast of Hastings, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stockham. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 326 and 340. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
